name: Improved Armour
description: Incremental improvements to the padding, materials, and enchantments
of armour provides a substantial survivability improvements.

name: Extra Health Potion
description: A backup health potion is a simple precaution for any
long duration expedition.

name: Sharpness Enchantment
description: The sharpness enchantment intensifies weapon force into a
smaller area, which provides a general increase to damage
done with no increased weight.

name: Firebolt Beads
description: A jar of hardened clay beads, each stamped with 'Fire'.
When thrown, ignite and sped towards their target.

name: Ignite Rod
description: A simple mahogany rod that somehow always feels slightly too
warm to the touch. Ignites the target in flames.

name: Rage Potion
description: A potion distilled through Life and Strength that
provides might strength for a few moment

name: Wand of Venom
description: A dark wood rod carved with serpent motifs with a
Vipers fang attached to the end. Fires a bolt of poison
a short distance.

name: Soothing Breeze
description: A cape knit from a fine green moss and gold thread
Providers an active regeneration effect upon activation

name: Dagger of Sapping
description: A wicked sharp dagger made from a huge vine thorn,
engraved with deep runes. Drips with a thick poison.

name: Black Ice
description: A single large icicle of black ice with faint etchings
When thrown does devastating damage to a single enemy.

name: Cursed Blade
description: A bastard sword carved from a single piece of unmelting ice.
Engraved are forbidden and cursed words which both steal strength
from those cut by it but doom the wielder to misfortune

name: Dark Waters
description: Those willing to consume this tainted brew will be cut by ice
but then protected from the worst of others attacks for awhile.

name: Sprint Boots
description: Comfortable boots made from potion treated leather, rubber soles
and tiny indents each one containing a rune enscribed ruby. When
activated one moves so far that time itself seems to slow.
